mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reminder (user_id, goal_id, title, remind_time, is_read, related_entity_type, related_entity_id, reminder_type, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{goalId}, #{title}, #{remindTime}, #{isRead}, #{relatedEntityType}, #{relatedEntityId}, #{reminderType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, goal_id, title, remind_time, is_read, related_entity_type, related_entity_id, reminder_type, create_time, update_time FROM reminder WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, user_id, goal_id, title, remind_time, is_read, related_entity_type, related_entity_id, reminder_type, create_time, update_time FROM reminder WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY remind_time DESC

SELECT id, user_id, goal_id, title, remind_time, is_read, related_entity_type, related_entity_id, reminder_type, create_time, update_time FROM reminder WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = false ORDER BY remind_time ASC

SELECT id, user_id, goal_id, title, remind_time, is_read, related_entity_type, related_entity_id, reminder_type, create_time, update_time FROM reminder WHERE goal_id = #{goalId} ORDER BY remind_time DESC
